sampleAssessments.frameworkDetails: Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) with Proof of Stake consensus. Mature ecosystem with extensive tooling and documentation.
sampleAssessments.sdkAvailability: Web3.js, Ethers.js, Hardhat, Truffle, Foundry, Remix IDE. Comprehensive SDK ecosystem with excellent TypeScript support.
sampleAssessments.rawQuestionnaireData: Ethereum is the most established smart contract platform with over $200B TVL. EVM compatibility is standard across most L2s and sidechains.
sampleAssessments.additionalNotes: Most mature blockchain ecosystem with extensive Ledger integration already available.

sampleAssessments.frameworkDetails: Tendermint consensus with Cosmos SDK. IBC protocol for cross-chain communication. Custom transaction format.
sampleAssessments.sdkAvailability: Cosmos SDK, CosmJS, CosmWasm. Good TypeScript support but requires custom implementation.
sampleAssessments.rawQuestionnaireData: Cosmos Hub uses Tendermint consensus with IBC for cross-chain communication. Custom transaction encoding required.
sampleAssessments.additionalNotes: IBC protocol adds complexity but enables cross-chain functionality.

sampleAssessments.frameworkDetails: Custom BVM (Blockchain Virtual Machine) with Proof of History consensus. Fast finality and high throughput.
sampleAssessments.sdkAvailability: Solana Web3.js, Anchor framework, Solana CLI. Good documentation but custom VM requires learning curve.
sampleAssessments.rawQuestionnaireData: Solana uses Proof of History for fast finality. Custom account model and transaction format. High performance but different from EVM.
sampleAssessments.additionalNotes: Fast finality may conflict with hardware wallet security model. Custom account system requires careful implementation.
